template_info.name: Balanced Starter Team
template_info.description: A well-rounded team perfect for beginners learning the fundamentals of Pokemon battles
template_info.usage_notes: This team focuses on solid fundamentals with good type coverage and balanced stats. Each Pokemon fills a different role while being easy to use.
learning_objectives: Learning different battle roles (physical attacker, special attacker, tank, support)

pokemon.name: charizard
pokemon.strategy: Primary special attacker with good coverage moves
pokemon.tips: Use sunny-day setups to boost fire moves and enable instant Solar Beam

pokemon.name: blastoise
pokemon.strategy: Bulky water-type that can take hits and provide utility
pokemon.tips: Great defensive pivot that can also hit hard with water moves

pokemon.name: venusaur
pokemon.tips: Set up Leech Seed early for consistent healing and chip damage

pokemon.name: pikachu
pokemon.strategy: Fast electric attacker with priority and status
pokemon.tips: Use Thunder Wave to slow down faster threats, then sweep with Thunderbolt

pokemon.name: machamp
pokemon.strategy: Strong physical attacker with good coverage
pokemon.tips: Bullet Punch provides priority for finishing weakened opponents

pokemon.name: alakazam
pokemon.strategy: High-speed special attacker with setup potential
pokemon.tips: Set up Calm Mind when you have a favorable matchup, then sweep
